entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` TEXT NOT NULL, `mode` TEXT NOT NULL, `locale` TEXT NOT NULL, `seed` INTEGER NOT NULL, `question_count` INTEGER NOT NULL, `started_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, `finished_at` INTEGER, `duration_sec` INTEGER, `pass_threshold` INTEGER, `score_pct` REAL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

indices.name: idx_attempts_started_at
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `idx_attempts_started_at` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`started_at` DESC)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`attempt_id` TEXT NOT NULL, `display_index` INTEGER NOT NULL, `question_id` TEXT NOT NULL, `selected_id` TEXT NOT NULL, `correct_id` TEXT NOT NULL, `is_correct` INTEGER NOT NULL, `time_spent_sec` INTEGER NOT NULL, `seen_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, `answered_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`attempt_id`, `display_index`), FOREIGN KEY(`attempt_id`) REFERENCES `attempts`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_answers_question_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_answers_question_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`question_id`)

indices.name: index_answers_attempt_id_display_index
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_answers_attempt_id_display_index` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`attempt_id`, `display_index`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `question_id` TEXT NOT NULL, `locale` TEXT NOT NULL, `reason_code` TEXT NOT NULL, `payload` TEXT NOT NULL, `attempt_count` INTEGER NOT NULL, `last_attempt_at` INTEGER, `created_at` INTEGER NOT NULL)

indices.name: index_queued_question_reports_created_at
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_queued_question_reports_created_at` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`created_at` ASC)

indices.name: index_queued_question_reports_question_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_queued_question_reports_question_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`question_id`)

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
